iopair.name: C-C771A-SUBV-10-ST01-DT07-DF11-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Read in a file containing a list of 10 other files. Open these files and read their contents. If these contents are purly alphanumeric, the memory gets properly free()'d, otherwise a missing reference is created.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_8 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_8 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_9 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_9 generated\n'

iopair.name: C-C771A-SUBV-10-ST01-DT07-DF11-CF19-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Read in a file containing a list of 10 other files. Open these files and read their contents. If these contents are purly alphanumeric, the memory gets properly free()'d, otherwise a missing reference is created.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=512 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_2_6 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_2_6 generated\n'
cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
